author: cbs8
title: Show Enthusiasm for Sports, Schools, Companies or Religions With FAN ATTIRE - Designed by InventHelp Client (RGL-101)
text:
InventHelp, a Pittsburgh-based invention company, is submitting the FAN ATTIRE to companies for their review.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 17, 2015
There are many ways to show support for a sports team, school, company or religion, but an inventor from Columbus, Miss., wanted to offer people a unique way to do so.
To meet this need he created the patent-pending FAN ATTIRE, an accessory that enables a user to show support for a sports team, college, high school, company or religion in a unique, individually personalized manner. It enhances the userâ€™s style, as well as promotes creativity and enjoyment. The accessory is easy to use, stylish and producible in design variations.
The original design was submitted to the National Sales office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-RGL-101, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
